content.description:
“O regina, novam cui condere Iuppiter urbem

iustitiaque dedit gentes frenare superbas,

Troes te miseri, ventis maria omnia vecti,

oramus, prohibe infandos a navibus ignes,

(5) parce pio generi, et propius res aspice nostras.”

Aeneid 1. 522-526
content.question: Translate the passage as literally as possible.

frqParts.text: Translate the passage as literally as possible.

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
